ayas.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
ayas.translation: Have you not regarded how your Lord dealt with the army of the elephants?
ayas.transliteration: alam tara kayfa fa`ala rabbuka bi-aṣ-ḥābil fīl

ayas.translation: Did He not make their stratagems go awry,
and send against them flocks of birds
pelting them with stones of shale,
thus making them like chewed-up straw?
